original_text: Jotham was twenty-five years old when he began to reign, and he reigned sixteen years in Jerusalem. His mother's name was Jerushah the daughter of Zadok.
korean_text: 요담이 왕위에 오를 때에 나이가 이십오 세라 예루살렘에서 십육 년 동안 다스리니라 그의 어머니의 이름은 여루사요 사독의 딸이더라

sentences.original_text: Jotham was twenty-five years old when he began to reign
sentences.korean_translation: 요담은 통치를 시작할 때 스물다섯 살이었습니다

sentences.original_text: and he reigned sixteen years in Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 예루살렘에서 열여섯 해 동안 통치했습니다

sentences.original_text: His mother's name was Jerushah the daughter of Zadok
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 어머니의 이름은 사독의 딸인 여루사였습니다
